item.title: TEAD Stock Surged 25% Pre-Market Today — What’s The Connection With Google?

item.title: US Layoffs In January Surge To Highest Since 2009, Hiring Slumps To Record Low
item.description: The firm stated that layoffs in January were the highest since January 2009, when 241,749 job cuts were announced.
